headline: Is Aon an Opportunity After Recent Industry Shifts and a 3.2% Weekly Gain?
summary: Wondering if Aon’s current share price presents a genuine opportunity, or if the stock’s run has already played out? You’re in the right place for a clear look at what matters most when it comes to value. While Aon saw a solid 3.2% rise this past week, it’s still down 6.0% over the last year, and has given up 2.7% in the last month. These recent moves could be changing how investors view the risk and upside here. Several recent news stories have highlighted shifts across the insurance...
